name: B. Little Pony and Sort by Shift
statement:
One day, Twilight Sparkle is interested in how to sort a sequence of
integers in non-decreasing order. Being a young unicorn, the only
operation she can perform is a unit shift. That is, she can move the
last element of the sequence to its beginning: Help Twilight Sparkle to
calculate: what is the minimum number of operations that she needs to
sort the sequence?
